Name

GetHandleType

Description

HRESULT
GetHandleType([out,retval] LONG* handleType);
This method reports what type the object represents: host, virtual machine, job, or snapshot.

Parameters

handleType
An enumerated type that identifies what the object represents.

Return Value

HRESULT

Remarks

  • This function does not apply in VBScript, since it is not possible to access the IVixHandle interface of an object.

Side Effects

None.

Requirements

VixCOM.h, since VMware Workstation 6.0.
